name: A Rollaxing Hike
description:
A casual puzzle game about letting things fall into place.

You are a die, rolling through a relaxing forest environment. As you encounter obstacles along the way, if you consider your options and keep moving you’ll eventually prove yourself a match for everything in your path and come out on top.

Or, less poetically: match the top-facing side as you roll yourself onto the unlocking symbols on the ground to make it through levels. Made in 48-ish hours using Unity, Blender, Photoshop, and a judicious application of caffeine, moxie, and sleep deprivation.

Move the die to match the numbers shown.

Move with: WASD or arrow keys.

 

The Team:

Programming, level design, and all sorts of techno-wizardry – 8LegBomb

Art assets, writing, and lots of puns along the way – MadCatMonkey
